alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 1:55PM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches. Highest snow amounts are expected in southern Lander county. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
